heroInfo.introduction: Software Engineer, Frontend Developer, Mobile App Developer
heroInfo.description: Experienced frontend developer with 2.5+ years in React Native, ReactJS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and State Management. Skilled in building user-friendly, responsive web and mobile apps. Collaborative, delivering high-quality results on time, and always learning to stay updated with trends.

listOfAchievements.text: Recognized as a Top 10 Finalist in the GitHub Open Source Challenge for contributing to large-scale full-stack projects and optimizing existing frameworks.
Achieved MongoDB Certified Developer status, showcasing advanced knowledge of NoSQL database design, indexing, and query optimization.
Earned AWS Certified Developer â€“ Associate, demonstrating expertise in deploying and managing full-stack applications using AWS cloud services.

projects.headline1: Acquired hands-on experience as a React Native developer, contributing to the development of various dynamic application. Mastered UI components and state management using react-redux.
projects.headline2: Implemented usage of fragments and lazy loading of images for speedy app rendering. Introduced usage of advanced debugging and diagnosing tools and extensions like Reactotron, Chrome redux extension.
projects.skills: React Native, ReactJS, JS, SASS, HTML, GraphQL

qualifications.headline1: Graduated with First-Class Distinction in B.Tech CSE.
qualifications.headline2: Won Hackathon at IIT Bombay (1st Prize).
